Description :
        Read manhwa Office Romance Frontline / Office Romance Front /   From an unfaithful boyfriend to a woman who comes to see me and behaves shamelessly. Everything was in a mess. But when a cr** car leaves, a Mercedes will come? I was literally crushed by this man. A dazzling face, a sculpted body, wealth, and abilities. There A perfect person that only I know! "No, get a grip! That person is your boss!" I tried to get a grip, but when I came to my senses I was already hooked. "President." "Go-Eun, do you want to call me by my name?" Maybe this love could have a different ending?!
